body_html:
I'd be happy to help, but I'm not sure how would I go about doing that?

In the time between comments I've run both conditions again with --batch-size 1 --test-batch-size 1 --log-interval 1, with no differences (I suspect unsurprisingly) in output between the thread settings.

body:
I'd be happy to help, but I'm not sure how would I go about doing that?

In the time between comments I've run both conditions again with `--batch-size 1 --test-batch-size 1 --log-interval 1`, with no differences (I suspect unsurprisingly) in output between the thread settings.
